definition: and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
to reveal one's talent (idiom)/to rise above others/to distinguish oneself
to turn to (sth else)/to switch to
to agree by chance (idiom); taking the same action without prior consultation
it is obvious that.../as one can well imagine...
clearly and easy to see (idiom); obviously/clearly/it goes without saying

sentences.english: All eastbound trains have been cancelled due to faulty signals.
sentences.chinese: 所有向东开去的火车由于信号错误而均被取消。

sentences.english: Some other drugs have to be taken on an empty stomach.
sentences.chinese: 而其他某些药物，必须在空腹服用。

sentences.english: And Vergeer admits that "sometimes it's tiring always trying to improve.
sentences.chinese: 沃吉尔承认，“有时会对无尽的提高而感到厌烦。”

sentences.english: But the formulae for calculating the inner stress of the arch pipes caused by wind oad is confined to equal section.
sentences.chinese: 而现有计算拱管风载内力的公式仅限于等截面范围。

sentences.english: Some 28 percent of adolescents say they are too tired to exercise, due to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 28%的年轻人表示，由于睡眠不足而没劲儿运动。

sentences.english: The weather became so bad that they had to turn back.
sentences.chinese: 天气变得很坏，他们只好原路而归了。

sentences.english: It doesn't have a point. It's all process and form.
sentences.chinese: 它没有目的，而仅仅是过程和形式。

sentences.english: However, the equivalent English word "forest" takes six.
sentences.chinese: 而对应的英文字“forest”需要六个字节。

sentences.english: He was always excited by his life and busy with where it was going.
sentences.chinese: 他总是为他的生活而兴奋，忙着它要去的地方。

sentences.english: And the Volt is made in America while the Prius comes from Japan.
sentences.chinese: 此外，Volt是美国制造，而普锐斯来自日本。

sentences.english: When I go dhave the long steep Road of Darkness.
sentences.chinese: 当我行走在黑暗而险峻的路上。

sentences.english: The people who allowed torture have faced no punishment at all.
sentences.chinese: 而那些允许酷刑的人却不会受到任何处罚。

sentences.english: Ten nets are exquisite and regular, seemlingly having gained mercy of gods.
sentences.chinese: 网织的精巧而规矩，八卦形的张开，仿佛得到神主。

sentences.english: Some days must be dark and dreary.
sentences.chinese: 有些日子肯定幽暗而郁悒。

sentences.english: He was also a reckless adventurer who got lucky.
sentences.chinese: 同时他也是一位轻率鲁莽而运气十足的冒险家。

sentences.english: And why do we fall for it, year after year?
sentences.chinese: 而我们又为什么年复一年为之倾倒？

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
due to/as a result of/thanks to/owing to/since/because
